thread.title: Here's what happens when a Giants fan marries a Patriots fan
thread.title_full: Here's what happens when a Giants fan marries a Patriots fan

title: Here's what happens when a Giants fan marries a Patriots fan
text:
Here’s what happens when a Giants fan marries a Patriots fan Resize Text By Marissa Payne October 19 at 1:50 PM Follow @marissapayne 
It’s a good thing you don’t cut the wedding cake until after your spouse vows to be with you through better or for worse, otherwise maybe this upstate New York wedding wouldn’t have ended so happily ever after. See, here’s the groom’s cake that New York Giants fan Liz Gigliotti surprised her new husband, a longtime New England Patriots fan, with this weekend. 
In case you’re wondering, yes, that is Pats quarterback Tom Brady in a dress and high heels standing ever so gingerly atop a deflated football. Here’s an even better look. You can see Brady’s dress even has sequins. 
Luckily for Gigliotti, she seems to have married someone who can take a joke. And a big bite. 
Dave was an awesome sport about his deflatecake! He even gave Tom Brady a… kiss? 
That’s her good-sport groom Dave enjoying the fruits, er, sweets of her joke. 
As they say, true love conquers all. Even DeflateGate. 
(H/t: NESN ) Marissa Payne writes for The Early Lead, a fast-breaking sports blog, where she focuses on what she calls the “cultural anthropological” side of sports, aka “mostly the fun stuff.” She is also an avid WWE fan. sports Success!
